lead_paragraph: Valentina Vezzali, 42, a six-time Olympic champion, helped Italy win a silver medal at the team world championships in Rio de Janeiro, her final event.
snippet: Valentina Vezzali, 42, a six-time Olympic champion, helped Italy win a silver medal at the team world championships in Rio de Janeiro, her final event.
abstract: Russia women's fencing team defeats Italy, 45-39, at world championships in Rio de Janeiro marks last event for Italian star Valentina Vezzalia.
